steps.retrieved_evidence: I'm not a doctor, but it sounds like you might be experiencing some sleep deprivation or maybe even a bit of paranoia! Seeing faces in your luggage is probably just your brain playing tricks on you. Maybe take a walk outside, get some fresh air and sunlight? Get back to bed when you're feeling more refreshed and alert.
